allow_ads_from_subs.message: Do not block ads for subscribed channels

auto_execute_script.message: Automātiski palaist skriptu, kad YouTube ir atvērts jaunā cilnē

auto_hide_cards_end_screens.message: Automātiski noņemt sākuma un beigu ekrānus

auto_sort_comments.message: Automātiski sakārtot komentārus sākot ar jaunākajiem

block_hfr_formats.message: Force the use of standard frame rates formats (24, 25, 30 FPS) instead of high frame rates formats (48, 50, 60 FPS)

block_webm_formats.message: Force the use of the MP4 format and the AVC codec (H.264) instead of the WebM format and the VP9 codec (maximum resolution 1080p60 HD)

bottom_of_window.message: At the bottom of the window

cards_end_screens_control_info.message: Click to toggle cards and end screens visibility

center_control_bar.message: Center the control bar below the video player when it is expanded or when the full screen mode is active

cinema_mode_control_info.message: Click to toggle the cinema mode

cinema_mode_toggle_size.message: Automātiski paplašināt, vai samazināt video atskaņotāju, ja ieslēgts kino skats

control_speed.message: Regulēt atskaņošanas ātrumu ar peles rullīti kad kursors ir uz video atskaņotāja, un ir nospiests Ctrl taustiņš uz tastatūras

control_speed_mouse_button.message: Tikai, ja nospiests peles labais taustiņš

control_volume.message: Kontrolēt skaņas līmeni ar peles rullīti kad kursors ir uz video atskaņotāja

control_volume_mouse_button.message: Tikai, ja peles labais taustiņš ir nospiests

controls_visible.message: Keep controls visible without having to click the ••• control or hover over it with the mouse cursor

controls_within_control_bar.message: Place controls within a control bar

controls_within_video_player.message: Place controls within the video player

custom_script_control_info.message: Click to execute the custom script

custom_script_instructions.message: Iekopējiet, vai uzrakstiet JavaScript kodu šeit, saglabājiet ar pogu lejā. Pēc tam noklikšķiniet uz "Pielāgots skripts" kad vēlaties to palaist.

custom_script_warning.message: Drošības dēļ Jūs drīkstiet lietot kodu, kuru Jūs saprotiet, vai kodu kuru rakstījis Jums uzticams izstrādātājs.

custom_theme_instructions.message: Lekopējiet vai uzrakstiet savu CSS kodu šeit, tad saglabājiet ar apakšējo pogu.

description.message: Take control of YouTube and boost your user experience!

detailed_description.message:
Built to get the most out of YouTube, this extension comes packed with all sorts of features that allow you, among other things, to manage ads as you wish, control the playback speed and the volume level with the mouse wheel, automate repetitive tasks such as selecting the appropriate playback quality, configure dozens of keyboard shortcuts to control YouTube like a pro, and much more... Give it a try! But be aware that you will never want to use YouTube without it after that ;)

Proudly recommended by Mozilla, this extension does not collect data and respects users' privacy.

YouTube is a trademark of Google LLC. Use of this trademark is subject to Google Permissions.

display_control_bar.message: Display the control bar only when hovering over it with the mouse cursor

expanded_player_viewport.message: Use the available space based on the viewport dimensions to expand the video player

export_instructions.message: Izveidot jaunu teksta dokumentu un iekopēt kodu nemodificējot to.

flip_horizontally_control_info.message: Click to flip the video horizontally

flip_vertically_control_info.message: Click to flip the video vertically

ignore_playlists.message: Do not prevent autoplay for playlists

import_error.message: Rezerves kopijas faila saturs nav pareizs!

import_instructions.message: Lekopēt rezerves kopijas faila saturu un nospiest pogu "Importēt". Lapa automātiski pārlādēsies, ja iestatījumi būs veiksmīgi importēti.

keyboard_shortcuts_control_info.message: Click to display the list of all the keyboard shortcuts for YouTube (external page)

keyboard_shortcuts_page.message: Parādīt visus tastatūras īsceļus priekš YouTube

launch_mini_player.message: Palaist mini atskaņotāju, kad tin uz leju, lai lasītu komentārus

not_interested_control_info.message: Peles kliķšķis izlaiž vai aizver reklāmu

options_control_info.message: Click to open the options page

page_reload_required.message: Enhancer for YouTube™ has just been updated, all the YouTube pages must be reloaded.

pause_videos.message: Pause videos playing in background tabs when a video starts playing in the foreground tab

pop_up_player_control_info.message: Click or right-click to watch with the pop-up player

pop_up_player_embeds_full_screen.message: Pop-up player and embedded videos (full screen):

preserve_black_bars_color.message: Nemainīt vertikālo skalu krāsu, ja tiek izmantots YouTube-DeepDark skats, vai ieslēgts kino skats

prevent_autoplay.message: Prevent videos loaded in background tabs from automatically playing

prevent_autoplay_foreground_tab.message: Prevent videos loaded in the foreground tab from automatically playing as well

rate_extension.message: Rate your experience with Enhancer for YouTube™.

reverse_mouse_wheel_direction.message: Mainīt peles rullīša virzienu, kad tiek regulēta skaņa, vai atskaņošanas ātrums

reverse_playlist_control_info.message: Click or right-click to watch a playlist in reverse order with the pop-up player

screenshot_control_info.message: Click to take a screenshot of the video

select_quality_full_screen.message: Select a different playback quality when entering the full screen mode

size_control_info.message: Click to expand or shrink the video player or right-click to center the video player within the viewport

speed_control_info.message: Use the mouse wheel to control the playback speed or click to select the default playback speed or right-click to select the normal playback speed

speed_minus_control_info.message: Click to decrease the playback speed

speed_plus_control_info.message: Click to increase the playback speed

speed_variation.message: Ātruma variācijas regulējot ar peles rullīti, vai noklikšķinot uz pogām "-" un "+":

stop_videos.message: Completely stop videos instead of only preventing autoplay

switch_back_previous_quality.message: Switch back to the previous playback quality when exiting the full screen mode

video_filters_control_info.message: Click to toggle the video filters or right-click to toggle the video filters panel visibility

volume_booster_firefox_bug.message: Firefox bug: when the volume booster has been activated the playback speed cannot be modified and a page reload is required in order to fix the issue [more info: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1519707 ]

volume_variation.message: Skaļuma varianti, kad groza peles rullīti:

whitelist_control_info.message: Peles kliķšķis pievieno/noņem kanālu no atļautā saraksta
